label: benign
raw:
From: hr@example.com
To: alice@example.com
Subject: Updated holiday schedule

Hi Alice,
Please find the updated holiday schedule for this year attached in the intranet.
Thanks,
HR Team

label: phishing
raw:
From: security@example-support.com
To: bob@example.com
Subject: Urgent account verification required

Your account will be suspended unless you verify immediately: https://example.com/verify

label: benign
raw:
From: newsletter@shop.com
To: carol@example.com
Subject: Your weekly deals

Here are this week's deals on electronics and home goods.

label: phishing
raw:
From: billing@paypa1.com
To: dan@example.com
Subject: Payment failed

We could not process your payment. Update your billing details here: http://paypa1.com/update

label: benign
raw:
From: teammate@example.com
To: emma@example.com
Subject: Meeting notes

Sharing the notes from today's sprint planning in the shared drive.

label: phishing
raw:
From: it-helpdesk@example.com
Reply-To: it-reset@external-mail.com
To: frank@example.com
Subject: Password expires today

Your password expires today. Reset now to avoid lockout.

label: benign
raw:
From: events@community.org
To: grace@example.com
Subject: Community meetup reminder

Reminder about tomorrow's meetup at 6 PM. See you there!

label: phishing
raw:
From: ceo-office@example.com
To: henry@example.com
Subject: Immediate action required

I need you to process a wire transfer today. Reply ASAP.

label: benign
raw:
From: support@saas.com
To: ivy@example.com
Subject: Ticket update

We have resolved your support ticket. Let us know if you have questions.

label: phishing
raw:
From: account@bank-secure.com
To: jack@example.com
Subject: Suspicious activity detected

Verify your account activity here: https://bank-secure.com/login?session=expired

label: benign
raw:
From: calendar@service.com
To: kate@example.com
Subject: Event invitation

You have been invited to a calendar event next week.

label: phishing
raw:
From: update@cloud-storage.com
To: leo@example.com
Subject: Storage limit exceeded

Your files will be deleted unless you confirm your account: http://cloud-storage.com/confirm

label: benign
raw:
From: orders@bookstore.com
To: mia@example.com
Subject: Order shipped

Your order has shipped and will arrive in 3-5 days.

label: phishing
raw:
From: rewards@airlines.com
To: nick@example.com
Subject: Claim your reward now

Click to claim your reward: http://airlines.com/reward?user=nick

label: benign
raw:
From: no-reply@github.com
To: olivia@example.com
Subject: New sign-in

New sign-in from Chrome on Windows. If this was you, you can ignore this message.

label: phishing
raw:
From: admin@corp.example.com
To: paul@example.com
Subject: Verify your mailbox

Please verify your mailbox to avoid deactivation: https://corp.example.com/verify

label: benign
raw:
From: finance@example.com
To: quinn@example.com
Subject: Expense report approved

Your expense report has been approved and will be reimbursed next week.

label: phishing
raw:
From: delivery@shipper.com
To: riley@example.com
Subject: Delivery failed

We could not deliver your package. Update address: http://shipper.com/update

label: benign
raw:

To: sam@example.com
Subject: Release notes

Version 2.3 release notes are now available in the docs.

raw:
